body:
Greetings,


I've finally made the plunge from running Radiance in Linux on a PC to 
OSX, never thought I'd see the day!  I compiled Radiance using the OSX 
binaries and all seemed well until using the "rad" program with an illum 
source in the "rif" file.  Once mkillum finishes and rpict kicks in I 
get the following rpict error:


rpict: fatal - cannot find data file "illum12.dat"


The odd thing is that the illum12.dat file was created and is in the 
directory.
Thanks ahead for any insight / advice.


Chris Humann
